name: webrtc-audio-broadcast
description: WebRTC audio broadcast running across local network

scripts.generate: mkdir ./keys && openssl genrsa -out ./keys/client-key.pem 2048 && openssl req -new -key ./keys/client-key.pem -out ./keys/client.csr && openssl x509 -req -in ./keys/client.csr -signkey ./keys/client-key.pem -out ./keys/client-cert.pem

author: kmturley
